backend/main.mo: Primary Motoko canister defining admin credentials, access control, data models, counters, and CRUD state maps, including admin login verification.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module copying old actor state while resetting adminPassword to 'joana 123'.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping credential-related feature requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of concise summaries for various frontend components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base variables and dark-mode theme definitions for the frontend.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component routing between pages and rendering the application layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Wrapper component that restricts access to admin-only areas based on permissions and password validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPassw: Admin login modal that trims only outer whitespace and verifies credentials using useAdminPasswordGate.
frontend/src/components/agenda/Appointme: Dialog form for creating appointments, handling client/service selection, date/time input, and submission via agenda mutations.
Displays appointment details including status, time, client, service, and notes in a styled card.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandHeade: Renders the application header with logo images and a small tagline.
frontend/src/components/clientes/ClientD: Shows client details, preferences, and appointment history using tabs and service lookup.
frontend/src/components/clientes/ClientF: Dialog for adding a new client with fields for contact info, preferences, and allergies, submitting through client mutations.
frontend/src/components/estoque/ProductC: Card displaying product info, stock levels, low‑stock warning, and a quick adjustment button.
frontend/src/components/estoque/ProductF: Dialog form to add new inventory products with validation and submission via estoque mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/estoque/StockAdj: Dialog for increasing or decreasing a product's stock with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/expenses/IncomeV: Renders a bar chart comparing income and expenses per month using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/expenses/Transac: Form to add income or expense transactions with validation and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeCategor: Grid of home page category buttons that navigate to different app sections with icons.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeHeroCar: Image carousel for the home page with navigation arrows and slide indicators.
frontend/src/components/home/WhatsAppFlo: Floating button that opens a WhatsApp chat link for contacting the business.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, content area, floating WhatsApp button, bottom navigation, and footer.
frontend/src/components/servicos/Service: Service list item showing image, details, formatted price/duration, and a button to schedule.
Dialog form for creating a new service with validation, preset support, and submission via useServicosMutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Checks whether the current caller is an admin using the backend actor.
Handles admin password validation with session persistence and backend verification.
frontend/src/hooks/useAgenda.ts: Fetches appointments filtered by date and provides mutation for creating new appointments.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientes.ts: Defines client hooks; fetching returns empty list and mutations allow adding clients via backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useEstoque.ts: Fetches product inventory and provides mutations for adding products and updating quantities.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, authentication handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Minimal shared hook that checks backend health based on actor availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useServicos.ts: Fetches services, exposes active services, and provides mutations for adding and toggling service status.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransactions.ts: Fetches transactions, monthly aggregates, and provides mutations to add, update, and delete transactions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes plus typography and texture styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLandingPage.tsx: Admin dashboard landing page showing navigation cards for inventory and expenses, gated by admin access.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Login form for admin access with username/password validation and navigation on success.
frontend/src/pages/AgendaDeHojePage.tsx: Displays daily appointments with date navigation and a dialog to create new appointments.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogoDeServicosPag: Manages service catalog with search, nails filter, service creation, and scheduling support.
frontend/src/pages/ControleDeEstoquePage: Admin-only inventory management page with search, low‑stock filtering, and product create/adjust dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/ExpensesDashboardPage: Renders an admin-gated expenses dashboard showing monthly income vs expenses and a form to add new transactions.
frontend/src/pages/FidelidadeClientesPag: Provides client search, listing, creation dialog, detail panel, and an owner-access button routing to admin inventory with validation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the home screen with hero carousel, welcome text, category grid navigation, and a WhatsApp CTA section.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the app’s design system.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, UI/UX requirements, known issues, and existing feature definitions for the salon management app.
